DataElement.preferredName: Lymphocyte Count Recovery Post Transplant Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date of lymphocyte count recovery post transplantation and as defined in a clinical trial protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphocyte Count Recovery Post Transplantation Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The determination of the number of lymphocytes in a blood sample._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the number of lymphocytes in a blood sample.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR clinical trial.4.7.2016.dmr
